coins.reverse_description: Small eagle perched on rock within wreath, 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' around rim

distinguishing_features: Teresa de Francisci model for Liberty
coins.obverse_description: Liberty head facing left wearing radiate crown, hair flowing, 'LIBERTY' above, 'IN GOD WE TRUST' across neck, date below
coins.reverse_description: Eagle perched on rock facing right, clutching olive branch, rays of sunlight from lower right, 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' above, 'ONE DOLLAR' below, 'PEACE' on rock

coins.reverse_description: Eagle landing on moon with Earth in background, 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' above, 'ONE DOLLAR' below, adaptation of Apollo 11 insignia

distinguishing_features: First non-allegorical woman on circulating coin
Often confused with quarter due to size
coins.obverse_description: Susan B. Anthony portrait facing right, 'LIBERTY' above, 'IN GOD WE TRUST' to right, date below, 11-sided inner border
coins.reverse_description: Eagle landing on moon surface with Earth above, 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' above, 'ONE DOLLAR' below, adapted from Apollo 11 insignia

coins.obverse_description: Sacagawea with baby Jean Baptiste on her back, facing right, 'LIBERTY' above, date and mint mark below
coins.reverse_description: Eagle in flight, 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' above, 'ONE DOLLAR' below, designed by Thomas Cleveland

coins.obverse_description: Sacagawea with baby Jean Baptiste on her back, facing right, 'LIBERTY' above, date and mint mark below
coins.reverse_description: Eagle in flight, 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA' above, 'ONE DOLLAR' below, designed by Thomas Cleveland

distinguishing_features: Second president dollar. Edge lettering. Doubled edge lettering error exists.
coins.notes: Second president issued. Doubled edge lettering error is valuable.
coins.obverse_description: John Adams portrait facing right
coins.reverse_description: Statue of Liberty with  denomination

distinguishing_features: First presidential dollar. Edge lettering. "Godless Dollar" error exists.
coins.notes: First presidential dollar. Famous "Godless Dollar" error missing edge lettering.
coins.obverse_description: George Washington portrait facing right
coins.reverse_description: Statue of Liberty with  denomination

distinguishing_features: Mint mark moved to obverse in 2009. Edge still lettered.
coins.notes: First year with mint mark on obverse instead of edge.
coins.obverse_description: William Henry Harrison portrait facing right
coins.reverse_description: Statue of Liberty with  denomination

distinguishing_features: Final year of original presidential dollar program.
coins.notes: Final year of original presidential dollar program before hiatus.
coins.obverse_description: Ronald Reagan portrait facing right
coins.reverse_description: Statue of Liberty with  denomination

distinguishing_features: Return of series after hiatus. George H.W. Bush.
coins.notes: Return of series in 2020 for George H.W. Bush after 3-year hiatus.
coins.obverse_description: George H.W. Bush portrait facing right
coins.reverse_description: Statue of Liberty with  denomination

distinguishing_features: First Native American Dollar. Three Sisters agriculture theme.
coins.notes: First year of series. Features Three Sisters agricultural practice.
coins.obverse_description: Sacagawea with baby Jean Baptiste
coins.reverse_description: Three Sisters agriculture - corn, beans, and squash

distinguishing_features: Great Law of Peace theme. Hiawatha belt design.
coins.notes: Second year. Honors Great Law of Peace and Iroquois Confederacy.
coins.obverse_description: Sacagawea with baby Jean Baptiste
coins.reverse_description: Hiawatha belt symbolizing Great Law of Peace

distinguishing_features: Mohawk ironworkers theme. New York skyline construction.
coins.notes: Honors Mohawk ironworkers who built American skyscrapers.
coins.obverse_description: Sacagawea with baby Jean Baptiste
coins.reverse_description: Mohawk ironworkers building New York skyline

coins.notes: Honors Elizabeth Peratrovich and Alaska Anti-Discrimination Act of 1945.
coins.obverse_description: Sacagawea with baby Jean Baptiste
coins.reverse_description: Elizabeth Peratrovich and Alaska Anti-Discrimination Act
